Reviews.Content: booking late told doubles left bridal suite 120 pounds worst rip recommend staying romantic occasion prepost wedding event handed worn door key 3 switches 5 lights 1 switch 3 5 lights getting replacement bulbs attitude reception staff dont lights sleeping lights bridal suite wall patio doors nice feature overlooked communal gardens curtains permanently closed advertised feature jacuzzi bath tried bath discovered night porter helpful accommodating couldnt fix sorry complained stay accused manager lying breaking bath reception ladys attitude immature attitude disaster damp walls broken lamps plug sockets hanging walls health safety regulations outside patio doors cigarette butts suspicious looking cigarette considering poster saying smoking found disgusting broken kettle told manager broken lied night porter brought replacement previously happy various broken charge £120 including cigarette burns duvet broken pillow covers broken shower fairly clean entirely hygienic anyones standards grossly charged breakfast shocking service limited amounts cooked food recommend taking complaint bridal indeed

Reviews.Title: “AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!”
Reviews.Author: pauladc68
Reviews.Content: daughter soninlaw booked wedding reception unhappy managers attitude start manager owner werent accomodating regards kept trying tell provide told decorate marquee night wedding marquee carpet hadnt hoovered linen tables groom morning wedding 6 guest tables 5 buffet laid food actually replenished cleared 1015 reception finished 1100pm werent food cleared overall unhappy service attitude manager owner recommend else stay hold event stay fawlty towers preferable
